name: supplication
content:

the act of asking a god or someone who is in a position of power for something in a humble way: Inside the temple, worshippers were kneeling in supplication. See
supplicant

He cast his eyes heavenward in mute supplication to whatever gods there were for patience and understanding, then followed her around the corner.
